## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addChild(child)](./obsidian.markdownpostprocessorcontext.addchild.md) | <p>Adds a child component that will have its lifecycle managed by the renderer.</p><p>Use this to add a dependent child to the renderer such that if the containerEl of the child is ever removed, the component's unload will be called.</p> |
|  [getSectionInfo(el)](./obsidian.markdownpostprocessorcontext.getsectioninfo.md) | Gets the section information of this element at this point in time. Only call this function right before you need this information to get the most up-to-date version. This function may also return null in many circumstances; if you use it, you must be prepared to deal with nulls. |
